record.id: field.name="sequence" and file.name="model" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: sequence
record.file.name: model

brief.brief: The sort order for the list of parts for the Category.

detail.detail: To modify the sort order within the Sequence field, select the Category key in the model table. Then, indicate the Category field first, and then enter other field names according to the order in which you would like the parts sorted.
Request Management uses the sequence you define to sort items in the catalog selection process.
Sequence numbers sort in ascending order with blanks coming first.
